comments:
N20071203 

Found this in my log. Looks like a lazy initialization synch issue.

java.lang.NullPointerException
    at java.util.Arrays.binarySearch0(Arrays.java:2001)
    at java.util.Arrays.binarySearch(Arrays.java:1943)
    at org.eclipse.debug.internal.core.LaunchManager.isExistingLaunchConfigurationName(LaunchManager.java:1974)
    at org.eclipse.debug.internal.core.LaunchManager.generateUniqueLaunchConfigurationNameFrom(LaunchManager.java:1029)
    at org.eclipse.jdt.junit.launcher.JUnitLaunchShortcut.createLaunchConfiguration(JUnitLaunchShortcut.java:335)
    at org.eclipse.jdt.junit.launcher.JUnitLaunchShortcut.findExistingLaunchConfigurations(JUnitLaunchShortcut.java:490)
    at org.eclipse.jdt.junit.launcher.JUnitLaunchShortcut.getLaunchConfigurations(JUnitLaunchShortcut.java:430)
    at org.eclipse.debug.internal.ui.launchConfigurations.LaunchShortcutExtension.getLaunchConfigurations(LaunchShortcutExtension.java:496)
    at org.eclipse.debug.internal.ui.contextlaunching.LaunchingResourceManager.getParticipatingLaunchConfigurations(LaunchingResourceManager.java:476)
    at org.eclipse.debug.internal.ui.contextlaunching.LaunchingResourceManager.getLabel(LaunchingResourceManager.java:306)
    at org.eclipse.debug.internal.ui.contextlaunching.LaunchingResourceManager.computeLabels(LaunchingResourceManager.java:227)
    at org.eclipse.debug.internal.ui.contextlaunching.LaunchingResourceManager$2.run(LaunchingResourceManager.java:137)
    at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:55)
Fixed in LaunchManager. #getAllSortedConfigNames() should be synchronized.
